title: Task 1: Explain how a work demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW Monticello demonstrates continuity with earlier architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW Monticello demonstrates continuity with earlier architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW Monticello demonstrates continuity with earlier architectural traditions.

title: Task 2: Explain how a work demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW Monticello demonstrates change from earlier architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW Monticello demonstrates change from earlier architectural traditions.
Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW Monticello demonstrates change from earlier architectural traditions.

title: Task 3: Explain why a work of art demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY Thomas Jefferson chose to reference earlier architectural traditions.
The response accurately uses ONE example of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY Thomas Jefferson chose to reference earlier architectural traditions.
The response accurately uses TWO examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY Thomas Jefferson chose to reference earlier architectural traditions.
